content: This is a **list of [disability](/wiki/Disability) organizations in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**. ## General - City Harvest Community Services Association - Disabled People's Association - Touch Community Services - [Rainbow Centre](/wiki/Rainbow_Centre) - Presbyterian Community Services - Christian Outreach for The Handicapped - Extraâ€¢Ordinary People ## Autism - Autistic Association - [Autism Resource Centre](/wiki/Autism_Resource_Centre_(Singapore)) - Christian Outreach for The Handicapped - [Pathlight School](/wiki/Pathlight_School) - St. Andrew's Mission School ## Cerebral Palsy - Cerebral Palsy Alliance Singapore ## Cleft Lip & Palate - Cleft Lip and Palate Association of Singapore ## Down syndrome - Down Syndrome Association ## Dyslexia - Cornerstone Learning Needs Centre - Dyslexia Association of Singapore - Student Care Service - Swords & Stationery ## Muscular Dystrophy - Muscular Dystrophy Association - Motor Neurone Disease Association ## Deaf - [Singapore Association for the Deaf](/wiki/Singapore_Association_for_the_Deaf) - [Singapore School for the Deaf](/wiki/Singapore_School_for_the_Deaf) - Canossian School - ExtraOrdinary Horizons (Deaf Singapore) ## Intellectual disabilities - [Movement for the Intellectually Disabled of Singapore](/wiki/Movement_for_the_Intellectually_Disabled_of_Singapore) - Association for Persons with Special Needs - Metta School - Grace Orchard School - SUN-DAC ## Physical disabilities - Social Services - SPD - [National Disability League](/wiki/National_Disability_League) ## Rare Disorders - Rare Disorders Society of Singapore ## Visual impairment - [Singapore Association of the Visually Handicapped](/wiki/Singapore_Association_of_the_Visually_Handicapped) - [Guide Dogs Singapore](/wiki/Guide_Dogs_Singapore) ## Others - [Children's Cancer Foundation](/wiki/Children%27s_Cancer_Foundation) - [Singapore Children Society](/wiki/Singapore_Children_Society) - Singapore Disability Sports Council - [Special Olympics Singapore](/wiki/Special_Olympics_Singapore) - Very Special Arts Singapore - [List of youth organisations in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_youth_organisations_in_Singapore) - [List of social service agencies in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_social_service_agencies_in_Singapore)
title: List of disability organisations in Singapore
